medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, decreased appetite, and fatigue.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began gradually a few days prior, with a constant dull pain in the epigastric region lasting for 2 days. Pain intensity rated 7/10. Associated with decreased appetite. Denied radiation of pain, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, or constipation. Subjective fevers noted. Currently feels okay, denying pain as long as he doesn't move around too much.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prostate cancer (s/p Cyberknife treatment), DVT (s/p warfarin treatment), colonic polyps, back pain, renal insufficiency, history of prostatitis, hypertension.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of pancreas issues. Mother with breast cancer.
